casebody.data:
No. 09-8826. Johnny Copeland, Petitioner v. Walter A. McNeil, Secretary, Florida Department of Corrections, et al. 559 U.S. 1040, 130 S. Ct. 2068,

176 L. Ed. 2d 420,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 2822. March 29, 2010.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Eleventh Circuit denied.
